metadata.title: CVE-2016-7969 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The wrap_lines_smart function in ass_render.c in libass before 0.13.4allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read)via unspecified vectors, related to "0/3 line wrapping equalization."

criterions.comment: libass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
